page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT
page.content: There are not many places of employment in our area and the nearest job centre is at Kidderminster or Ludlow. The reason that we don't have many jobs is because most of our country is wasteland and rough grazing. The few places that offer employment are the Foxwood lodge. The crown inn and Hopton bank garage. The Post Offices are run by the families who own them. The farms are small and are run by their owners. Most people travel to work outside the area to factories at Tenbury,Ludlow,Cleobury Mortimer Kidderminster,or drive lorries, or work in offices.
